name: Chillmew (IndieBonusStage, Dianiki)
description:
• Welcome to Chillemew a mobile game, for android (for the moment), where you play as a playful cat named Chucho that likes to follow his love Shelly everywhere. This a cozy game with a little bit of puzzle-based mechanics, where you can relax for some minutes trying to beat your score. 

    Requirements
  • Functional Gyroscope
  • Android 11 or more

    How to Play :
  • The objective is to make Chucho go from point A to Bin this case Shelly the black cat
  • Beware the floor is lava..in a sense..If Chucho touches the floor or falls off the map will lose
  • How can you avoid the floor? The dice will give you
